text: The Hockey Players () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Rafail Goldin.Программа показов Музея кино на март 2015: «Кинокалендарь»ХОККЕИСТЫ (1964) It stars Vyacheslav Shalevich, Vladimir Ivashov, and Aleksandr Orlov. ==Actors== * Vyacheslav Shalevich as Anatoly Duganov * Vladimir Ivashov as Morozov * Aleksandr Orlov as Vladimir Vvedensky * Nikolai Rybnikov as Coach Lashkov * Gennadi Yukhtin as Peter Kudrichi * Georgiy Zhzhonov as Coach Sperantov * Mikhail Gluzsky as Chairman Ilyin == References == Category:Soviet movies Category:1965 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Hockey Players (movie)
